actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Financial Management, the Budget, and International Security.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
short_title: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2003

summary.text: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2003 - Amends Federal law concerning Federal workers' compensation to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

titles.title: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2003
A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2003
